title: Don't Think Twice
description: Reeling from a rash of crime in their small town, three lifelong friends team up with Amelia, to find out who is behind the break-ins. Then things start to heat up when one of the local store owners is hurt in another break in. And that’s not the only thing heating up.Amelia and Detective Ford have a connection hotter than the summer sun. But he’s elusive, angry, and hard to read. After a sizzling encounter like no other, Amelia begins to consider staying in Mountain Valley to find out if there is more to their relationship than just hot sex in random places.But when Amelia sees Derek with a mystery woman, everything changes. Should she leave him behind and just focus on the crimes? Or is their connection too intense to ignore?What will Amelia decide, and will she be able to stick to her decision?
author: Kelly Jayne
